articles.content:
Former Chairman of Hanchongryon Sentenced to Penal Servitude 
    Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Western District Court sentenced Jong Jae Uk, chairman of the 11th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils, to three years' imprisonment and five years' stay of execution on July 29, according to south Korean MBC.
 The court charged him with violation of the "Security Law" and the "law on rally and demonstration".

articles.content:
Russia Donates Food to DPRK 
    Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- About 35,000 tons of food donated to the DPRK by Russia through the World Food Program arrived at Nampho Port on July 31.
 Russia's donation of food to the DPRK is an expression of the traditional relations of friendship between the two governments and two peoples and an encouragement to the Korean people.

articles.content:
Greetings to Beninese President
    Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Beninese President Mathieu Kerekou on Friday on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the independence of Benin.
 Sincerely wishing the president and the Beninese people great successes in their work for the peace and prosperity of the country, the message expressed the belief that the longstanding friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further strengthen.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Switzerland
    Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Joseph Deiss, president of the Swiss Confederation, on July 30 on the occasion of the Swiss national day .
 Expressing the belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, the message sincerely wished the friendly people of Switzerland prosperity and well-being.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets with Cambodian King
Kim Jong Il Receives Highest Orders of Kingdom of Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets with Cambodian King
    Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Saturday visited the Jangsuwon State Guest House where His Majesty the King of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk stays and met with him.
 Present there were Her Majesty the Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk and other suite members and Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Oum Mannorine.  The king presented a gift to Kim Jong Il and expressed profound thanks to him for the cordial hospitality accorded to him during his stay in the DPRK.    
 Kim Jong Il conversed with the king in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.
